sentences.english: Located at San Du He in HuaiRou county, about 72 kms from down town Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 慕田峪長城位於懷柔縣三度河鄉，距市區72公里。

sentences.english: You can eat delicious rainbow trout in Huairou .
sentences.chinese: 在懷柔可以喫到鮮美的虹鱒。

sentences.english: For many years the U.S. government took a relaxed approach which enabled the popularity of cigarette smoking.
sentences.chinese: 美國政府曾有很多年都對吸菸採取了懷柔政策。

sentences.english: For many years the U. S. government took a relaxed approach which enabled the popularity of cigarette smoking.

sentences.english: A wise policy of "conciliation" was pursued towards the conquered state.
sentences.chinese: 被征服國家被施以明智的“懷柔政策。”

sentences.english: He needs a softer approach to resolving social conflicts.
sentences.chinese: 他要用懷柔政策解決社會爭端。

sentences.english: Huairou district from a commercial construction site Master Li said the workers.

sentences.english: In the end, we proposed 11 recommendations and countermeasures for the sustainable development in Huairou county.
sentences.chinese: 最後，對懷柔縣可持續發展得出了11條對策和建議。

sentences.english: Findik is located at Huairou Yanqi Industrial Development Zone in Beijing .
sentences.chinese: 公司位於北京市懷柔雁棲經濟開發區。
